title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8139.13 - Town of Clarkstown
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8139.13 - Town of Clarkstown

State Regulations
(a) Route
59. Route 59, SH 689, between Hopf Drive and Route 304, a distance of 1.7 miles
in the Town of Clarkstown. (b) West

Nyack Road. The eastbound and westbound roadways of West Nyack Road, a town
roadway, between Route 59 and Route 304, a distance of 0.6+- mile. (c) Old Nyack Turnpike. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Old Nyack Turnpike, between Pascack Road and the IR 87
entrance ramp, a distance of 0.1+- mile. (d) Hopf Drive. The northwest and
southeastbound roadways of Hopf Drive, between Route 59 and Pascack Road, a
distance of 0.1+- mile. (e) Pascack

Road. The northbound and southbound roadways of Pascack Road, between Hopf

Drive and Murry Hill Road, a distance of 0.5+- mile. (f) Murry Hill Road. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Murry Hill Road, between Pascack Road and the United

Parcel Service terminal, a distance of 0.1+- mile. (g) Smith Street. Smith Street, between Route
59 and Route 304 southbound entrance ramp, a distance of 0.1+- mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8139.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
